title: Recovering My Old Account
body:
So i haven't played league for about 2 years now and I've recently wanted to start getting back into it. The problem is i forgot my password and i do not have access to the email i on my account. It was a Verizon email but i recently moved so i do not have Verizon anymore which also means no access to the email. Riot support basically won't help me because i don't have things like a pay-pal linked to that email or some old pre paid card pin numbers which i don't have anymore since its been roughly 2 years. I named every champion i owned on that account and many skins i had on that account. I also gave them my ign which is different then my user name since i changed it with rp. I gave the first password i had before i was forced to change to this new one(the one i don't remember). I don't know what else i could do and i really want to play again but i need help. It took me 2 weeks sending emails back and forth with support and it got me no where so i don't know what else to do. Does anyone have any ideas or anyway to help me because i really want to play again.

Ps: I made this account just for a forums post

replies.body:
Unless we're able to verify you're the account owner after being provided with enough info, we can't release an account. The only thing you can do at this point is to reach back out in another support ticket and do your best to accurately remember the information that the [**recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) asks for.

Let me know if you have any questions.
